title: Mutton chops with potato and turnip gratin
description: Mutton, potatoes and turnips are given a bit of flair with sauce gribiche and lashings of cream.
ingredients: 12 mutton chops, French-trimmed (ask your butcher to do this for you, and keep the mutton trimmings)
1 pointed cabbage (such as hispi cabbage), root removed, leaves thinly sliced
600g/1lb 5oz floury potatoes, such as Maris Piper, peeled, sliced into 2mm-thick slices using a mandoline
600g/1lb 5oz large turnips, sliced into 2mm-thick slices using a mandoline
salt and freshly ground white pepper
